title: 'Stunned' Prince Harry reacts to criticism over his nomination for ESPY's Pat Tillman Award
content: Prince Harry faced backlash upon being named the 2024 ESPY Pat Tillman Award for Service recipient, with critics, including Tillman's mother, questioning the choice. ESPN defended the decision citing Harry's Invictus Games contributions, yet a petition against it gathered 68,000 signatures. Critics argued others in the veteran community were more deserving, lacking Harry's privileges. Former NFL player Pat McAfee suggested a separate category for him, highlighting the controversy surrounding the announcement.
summary: Prince Harry faced backlash upon being named the 2024 ESPY Pat Tillman Award for Service recipient, with critics, including Tillman's mother, questioning the choice. ESPN defended the decision citing Harry's Invictus Games contributions, yet a petition against it gathered 68,000 signatures. Critics argued others in the veteran community were more deserving, lacking Harry's privileges. Former NFL player Pat McAfee suggested a separate category for him, highlighting the controversy surrounding the announcement.

title: United Airlines Boeing aircraft loses wheel after takeoff from Los Angeles
content: This marks the second instance in recent months where a United Airlines-operated Boeing aircraft lost a wheel following takeoff. In March, a Boeing 777 en route to Japan experienced a tire fall shortly after leaving San Francisco, necessitating an emergency landing.
summary: This marks the second instance in recent months where a United Airlines-operated Boeing aircraft lost a wheel following takeoff. In March, a Boeing 777 en route to Japan experienced a tire fall shortly after leaving San Francisco, necessitating an emergency landing.

title: White House clarifies on Parkinson's expert's visit to Biden: 'No'
content: ​Amid reports that a Parkinson's disease expert visited the White House and met President Joe Biden's doctor in January, the White House Monday said the president is not being treated for Parkinson's disease. The press briefing turned chaotic as press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre was asked to give clear answer on the visit of the Parkinson's specialist to which she strongly reacted and said she won't be able to divulge any name of experts for privacy and security reasons. She said Biden had seen a neurologist three times -- in three years -- connected to Biden's annual physical exams.
summary: ​Amid reports that a Parkinson's disease expert visited the White House and met President Joe Biden's doctor in January, the White House Monday said the president is not being treated for Parkinson's disease. The press briefing turned chaotic as press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre was asked to give clear answer on the visit of the Parkinson's specialist to which she strongly reacted and said she won't be able to divulge any name of experts for privacy and security reasons. She said Biden had seen a neurologist three times -- in three years -- connected to Biden's annual physical exams.

title: 'Justifying terrorism': Russian playwright and director held for playing Islamic State wives play
content: Playwright Svetlana Petriychuk and director Yevgenia Berkovich were sentenced to six years in prison for 'justifying terrorism' in their play 'Finist the Brave Falcon.' The trial raised concerns about freedom of expression in Russia. International condemnation follows amid a crackdown on anti-war sentiment in the artistic community.
summary: Playwright Svetlana Petriychuk and director Yevgenia Berkovich were sentenced to six years in prison for 'justifying terrorism' in their play 'Finist the Brave Falcon.' The trial raised concerns about freedom of expression in Russia. International condemnation follows amid a crackdown on anti-war sentiment in the artistic community.

title: This balcony is listed for rent at $360 per week in Sydney: 'Sunny room'
content: The photo of a balcony of a Sydney apartment has gone viral because it has been listed for rent in an advertisement on Facebook marketplace. The post qualifies the balcony as a "sunny room" in Haymarket but social media users commented that the sunny room is actually a broad balcony and nothing else.
summary: The photo of a balcony of a Sydney apartment has gone viral because it has been listed for rent in an advertisement on Facebook marketplace. The post qualifies the balcony as a "sunny room" in Haymarket but social media users commented that the sunny room is actually a broad balcony and nothing else.

title: Secret memo to replace Biden by August in circulation: 'Lord Almighty...'
content: ​President Joe Biden recently said he will opt out of the presidential race only if Lord Almighty asks him to do so. With a clear reference to that, a secret but detailed memo is being circulated among the Democrats saying, "Lord helps those who help themselves". The memo is to replace President Biden in a "blitz primary" before the party's convention in August if Biden can not be convinced to bow out. Two influential Democratic operatives are circulating the memo, New York Post reported citing Semafor.
summary: ​President Joe Biden recently said he will opt out of the presidential race only if Lord Almighty asks him to do so. With a clear reference to that, a secret but detailed memo is being circulated among the Democrats saying, "Lord helps those who help themselves". The memo is to replace President Biden in a "blitz primary" before the party's convention in August if Biden can not be convinced to bow out. Two influential Democratic operatives are circulating the memo, New York Post reported citing Semafor.

title: 2 men drown in Glacier National Park over the July 4 holiday weekend
content: Two men from India and Nepal drowned in Glacier National Park during the July 4 weekend. One slipped on Avalanche Lake Trail and was swept through a gorge; the other drowned in Lake McDonald, recovered at 35-40 feet depth by 8:20 pm. Consulates contacted. Both were vacationing from Portland, Oregon.
summary: Two men from India and Nepal drowned in Glacier National Park during the July 4 weekend. One slipped on Avalanche Lake Trail and was swept through a gorge; the other drowned in Lake McDonald, recovered at 35-40 feet depth by 8:20 pm. Consulates contacted. Both were vacationing from Portland, Oregon.

title: Defiant Biden tells party he will not quit as support continues to wane
'Run against me': Biden makes 3 things clear amid age row
content: ​President Joe Biden started the week with a bang -- first shooting off a letter to Democrats in doubt over his candidacy and then appearing on NBC's Morning Joe where he vigorously stamped out the growing criticism inside the party about his age, health etc. In a contrast to a shaky Biden, the president appeared firm and resolute as he said he does not care about what the elite donors are saying; he knows he can defeat Donald Trump and that's why he is in the race.
summary: ​President Joe Biden started the week with a bang -- first shooting off a letter to Democrats in doubt over his candidacy and then appearing on NBC's Morning Joe where he vigorously stamped out the growing criticism inside the party about his age, health etc. In a contrast to a shaky Biden, the president appeared firm and resolute as he said he does not care about what the elite donors are saying; he knows he can defeat Donald Trump and that's why he is in the race.

title: Slovakian Prime Minister Robert Fico takes first trip outside capital after assassination attempt
Internet thinks Dark Brandon is back after Biden's Morning Joe interview. Watch
content: Joe Biden in Pennsylvania campaign Sunday joked that Dark Brandon will be back soon. Hours later, the internet announced the arrival of Dark Brandon after Biden's interview on Morning Joe. In the interview, a resolute president said he does not care what elites are saying about his candidacy. Anyone who thinks Biden can't run for presidency should first run against him, challenge him at the convention, Biden said.
summary: Joe Biden in Pennsylvania campaign Sunday joked that Dark Brandon will be back soon. Hours later, the internet announced the arrival of Dark Brandon after Biden's interview on Morning Joe. In the interview, a resolute president said he does not care what elites are saying about his candidacy. Anyone who thinks Biden can't run for presidency should first run against him, challenge him at the convention, Biden said.

'Hunter Biden thinks he's smarter than his father's aides, acting as gatekeeper'
content: Democrats who want Joe Biden to drop out of the presidential race, which is not a possibility anymore after the president's Monday morning letter, have two hurdles to cross. Many think it's overzealous Dr Jill Biden who is now holding campaigns on her own but convicted Hunter Biden is another gatekeeper who is keeping a close watch on Biden now -- especially after the debate fiasco.
summary: Democrats who want Joe Biden to drop out of the presidential race, which is not a possibility anymore after the president's Monday morning letter, have two hurdles to cross. title: Taliban reduces government salaries of Afghan women
Rob Reiner says it's time to stop f***ing around, call for Biden to step down
content: 'When Harry met Sally' director Rob Reiner called for President Joe Biden stepping down the presidential race. He said it's time to stop f***ing around because if Donald Trump wins the election, America loses its democracy. "It’s time to stop f---ing around. If the Convicted Felon wins, we lose our Democracy. Joe Biden has effectively served US with honor, decency, and dignity. It’s time for Joe Biden to step down," Reiner posted on X.
summary: 'When Harry met Sally' director Rob Reiner called for President Joe Biden stepping down the presidential race. He said it's time to stop f***ing around because if Donald Trump wins the election, America loses its democracy. "It’s time to stop f---ing around. If the Convicted Felon wins, we lose our Democracy. Joe Biden has effectively served US with honor, decency, and dignity. It’s time for Joe Biden to step down," Reiner posted on X.

title: Mass brawl on Ryanair flight forces pilot to make emergency landing. A family was asked to swap seat
content: ​A Ryanair flight last week had to be diverted when it was flying at 30,000 feet as a fight between two families became a mass brawl -- 30 minutes into the flight. Footage published by the Sun shows passengers screaming at each other on the Morocco to London flight. A witness to the shocking brawl said it all started with a passenger asking a woman to swap the seat so that he could sit with his wife and children.
summary: ​A Ryanair flight last week had to be diverted when it was flying at 30,000 feet as a fight between two families became a mass brawl -- 30 minutes into the flight. Footage published by the Sun shows passengers screaming at each other on the Morocco to London flight. A witness to the shocking brawl said it all started with a passenger asking a woman to swap the seat so that he could sit with his wife and children.

title: Did Hawk Tuah girl turn down Playboy offer? Here's the truth
content: Hailey Welch said it is true that Playboy approached her through a friend to include her in some of their stuff but she rejected it. The viral Hawk Tuah girl in an Instagram Q&A said she is not doing OnlyFans and will never do as she's not comfortable with that thing.
summary: Hailey Welch said it is true that Playboy approached her through a friend to include her in some of their stuff but she rejected it. The viral Hawk Tuah girl in an Instagram Q&A said she is not doing OnlyFans and will never do as she's not comfortable with that thing.
